tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I just moved back to India after a long time and needed some dental work due to pain. I found the doctor on Practo and went in for a consultation. She examined me, explained the procedure and began root canal on the same day. I came back for an extraction and it was done by another doctor. The services are very good. On par with anywhere else in the world. Especially my extraction. Due to my nervousness around medical procedures, and given my anatomy, it‚Äôs fair to say that it‚Äôs not the easiest for a dentist to work. Having said that, they were very understanding and did a very good job. The crowns are good, and the fitting was perfect. I‚Äôm very happy with the quality. Though I have to me mention two things (below). 

Now there is a part of this I was not happy with. One is that they keep changing hands. Doctor, then an assistant one day, someone else the day after that, who clearly is learning. I‚Äôm not comfortable with that. Especially if I‚Äôm not told in advance. Actually even that I can deal with. I was offered a full ceramic crown (the most expensive one), and the points made to me were - the metal can cause decays and the ceramic is stronger and lasts longer. I went in for the additional expense. Come day of fixing crowns, I happened to notice that the crown was a metal and ceramic combo, which was not what I was told it was. No one was satisfactorily able to explain to me why this was the case. Though, the crowns were eventually re made and I got the full ceramic crowns. 

Overall I would recommend this clinic for dental work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I found this clinic near me and it had very good ratings and reviews. So I visited it when I had pain in my front tooth. It was a Sunday. And Dr. Lakshmi find that my entire tooth was infected and there was pus gathered at the top of my tooth. I required an emergency root canal. Dr. Lakshmi very patiently and kindly explained the issue. She then told me the cost and requested if I wanted to go ahead. I agreed and Dr. Lakshmi and her entire staff attended to it immediately and performed a root canal the same time. It was painless and I felt immediate relief. I had to put a crown soon since my tooth was now hollow after all the infection was taken care of. Dr. Lakshmi took the impressions and called me back twice because the lab had not perfected the crown. She is very thorough and makes sure that everything is done perfectly. I just completed my the entire process today. I'm very impressed by the dedication put in by Dr. Lakshmi and her staff. They are all very kind and soft spoken. And I can't appreciate their effort enough. Would recommend this clinic to everyone with tooth problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Lakshmi is a very caring & cocerned doc.both me & my husband are very senior  citizens.she takes spevual care of us like timely treatment at our comfort zone, informations abt.the procedure taking place , rest periods during the procedure etc. She taljs to us at leisure like a.greind & also on general topics as a friend.never rushes thro .the procedures. All in all we both are satisfied patients for the last 15 yrs.
She is good. Looks very costly. She will enforce to do the operation the same day. If you are looking for good treatment with average marginal cost, please do go there.

I was having a severe toothache, so I have booked for appointment after going throuth the reviews. During my appointment I was diagnosed by some other Doctor, who suggested that I have to undergo a minor surgery  for my problem.  
As I was having some other important work I ask them to schedule it after 2days but I felt they were rigid to get the surgery done on the same day and after so much request they agreed. 
They didn't even bother to give any medicine for my pain and ask to visit again after 2days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Don‚Äôt get me wrong and I want this feedback to be taken with no negative vibes. I found her ******** ************ *** **** **** ** * hurry to just complete the consultation and attend the other patients. On the fly she just told the price of highest quality crown available when she should have ideally been asking patient that these are types we have and we ‚Äúrecommend‚Äù this. However only after I told that I am aware of crown types, that‚Äôs when I was shown remaining types of crown. Do note that my treatment or tooth consultation was NOT done by her though I had booked for her treatment, I was checked by some other dentist. They might be certified but we wanted to consult only the specific dentist. Ps. On positive side, I liked the hygiene of the clinic

tags: Value for money,
review: Had good service.*** ****** ******** * ***** ** **** *** ****** *** *** ***********she said 400rps for filling and after the treatment is done,she said it's 2400.we were shocked to hear that after performing filling for 10 tooth.she said tooth extraction will be done by an expert *** ** ********* **** ** ** ***so if u want good service but doesn't care about the money,I will suggest this place . otherwise it doesn't suit for common people.. because we were shocked to get a bill of 30k after the treatment is done.also she mentioned cleanup will even reduce discoloration but after the treatment, discoloration was still there.
reply_text: We clearly  explained  the cost and after the payment  is done, we did the treatment.  We explained  clearly that clean up will remove scales and extrinsic strains but not intrinsic strains.

review:
**** ******** ** *** ******* ** **** ******** ***** **** *** *** * **** ******* **** ** ***** ****** ************ ** ** *****

I was stuck in India during pandemic and had to visit her for my broken crown. She charged me Rs. 25,000 for re root canal, re-crowning and some fillings.

80% of the service was provided by trainees who you can tell by seeing how they talk and conduct, **** **** **** ** ********** ** ********** **** ******* ** ***** *** ******** *** * ***** **** ********* *** * *** *** ***** ******* * ******* *** ******** **** ** ** *** **** *** **** ***** ****** ****** It was re root canal and doctor recommended me the best crown, some MM type that on surface has anal opening like feeling when your tongue grazes it.  Eww! Food particles continue getting stuck and in 5 months, it has already broken. So much for going premium.

I would definitely not recommend this dentist. * ***** **** ** *** *** ********** ******* *** ******* *** *** ******* *** **** ******* *** *** *** **** ****** ******* *** *** ******** *********** ** ******* ****** ***** ******************** ******

review:
My mother has been have dental issues since over 15 years now and we were so tired of hopping from one clinic to another with zero satisfaction and no solution to the problem . Then we visited Dr. Lakshmi‚Äôs clinic when shifted to Bannerghatta Road . It‚Äôs since then, we never even thought of changing doctor. She is like a family doctor for our dental issues . Yes , she is that friendly and makes the patient feel that comfort while conducting her procedures. Infact , she is so friendly with me also considering I am the daughter of her patient . We have so much confidence in her treatment that we only suggest her Clinic to whomsoever having teeth issue .
Now at last , I would like to talk  about the ambience and cleanliness of the clinic, I will give 5 out of 5 stars because , genuinely it does not feel like a clinic but the vibes are like recreational space .

reply_text: Very sorry to hear.after the root canal treatment is done, the teeth requires crown. We told you also to go for crown immediately. Temporary cement will not stay long. But charges are very high compared to other dentists. 
Root canal, crown, and other treatment charges should be moderate. 
And she should communicate about the charges before commencing the treatment. Half way done & teeth are filed , roaming around in teeth less situation had to agree with the charges she asked for. 
Otherwise she is a good n caring doctor.

tags: Value for money,
review:
Hi

Please dont visit this clinic **** **** ***** ***** *** ****** *** **** **** **** **** * **** *** the caping they gave warranty card and now all bit and peaces are coming out .when I went they just asking  fr money no service  they provide.Then what is the use of warranty card .

Please dont visit
reply_text: Some times crowns can chip off, if we bite very hard stuff. Under warranty crowns,  we don't charge the patient, except the material cost for impressions and lab material cost which is very nominal amount.
